sentences.en: A new report suggests that chewing-gum may be a health hazard.
sentences.cn: 一份新报告指出，口香糖可能对健康有害。

sentences.en: Cut out two pieces of cardboard and gum them together.
sentences.cn: 割两块硬纸板,再把它们粘在一起.

sentences.en: Deposits of plaque build up between the tooth and the gum.
sentences.cn: 牙齿和牙龈之间会滋生牙斑。

sentences.en: He was holding up a pound note that had been torn in half and stuck together with gum.
sentences.cn: 他举着一张被撕成两半后又用胶粘在一起的一英镑的钞票。

sentences.en: I do not chew gum in public.
sentences.cn: 我不在公共场合嚼口香糖。

sentences.en: I gave her a piece of candy in trade for a piece of gum.
sentences.cn: 我给她一块糖换她一块口香糖.

sentences.en: I've tried everything from herbal cigarettes to chewing gum.
sentences.cn: 中草药香烟、口香糖之类的我统统都试过了。

sentences.en: She was admonished for chewing gum in class.
sentences.cn: 她在课堂上嚼口香糖，受到了告诫。

sentences.en: Spit out that gum and pay attention.
sentences.cn: 把那块口香糖吐出来，注意听。

sentences.en: The boy bought three packs of gum.
sentences.cn: 那男孩买了三小盒口香糖.

sentences.en: The gum stuck to my fingers.
sentences.cn: 口香糖粘住了我的手指.

sentences.en: The toothbrush gently removes plaque without damaging the gums or causing bleeding.
sentences.cn: 牙刷轻轻地刷去齿菌斑，没有伤及牙床或引起出血。

sentences.en: They stopped up leaks with chewing gum.
sentences.cn: 他们用口香糖粘住了漏缝。

sentences.en: This old stamp isn't sticky any more; I shall have to gum it down onto the envelope.
sentences.cn: 这张旧邮票的背面没黏性了, 我得用胶把它粘在信封上.

sentences.en: We can stick these pictures into the book with gum.
sentences.cn: 我们可用胶水把这几张画粘贴在书里.

sentences.en: What I like is chewing - gum. "
When not removed, plaque causes tooth decay and gum disease.
sentences.cn: 牙斑如果不清除就会导致牙齿蛀蚀和牙龈疾病。

words.tran_cn: 粘性的，胶粘的；含树胶的；肿的（脚踝或腿）；拙劣的，讨厌的（俚语）
用牙床咬；使有黏性（gum的过去分词）
在…上涂树胶（gum的ing形式）；用牙床咀嚼

phrases.tran_cn: 阿拉伯树胶；水溶性阿拉伯胶
桉树；桉树村；产树胶之树
[植]香枫；香枫的树叶；枫香香脂

trans.tran_en: your gums are the two areas of firm pink flesh at the top and bottom of your mouth, in which your teeth are fixed

trans.tran_cn: 用胶粘，涂以树胶；使…有粘性
trans.tran_en: to stick together or in place with gum

trans.tran_cn: 胶合，涂以树胶，使…有粘性
